alert.note: Alert for Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 3:54PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Mariposa and northern Madera Counties through 430 PM PDT... At 353 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm, located about 8 miles east of Yosemite Valley, moving to the north at around 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Merced Lake High Sierra Camp, Merced Lake Ranger Station and Sunrise High Sierra Camp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Yosemite NP outside of the valley
